author: By JULHAS ALAM and ELAINE KURTENBACH Associated Press
title: Garment workers going unpaid as fashion labels cancel orders
description: DHAKA, Bangladesh (AP) — A survey of factory owners in Bangladesh found that major fashion retailers that are closing shops and laying off workers in Europe and the U.S. are also canceling their sometimes already completed orders, as workers often…
content:
DHAKA, Bangladesh (AP) A survey of factory owners in Bangladesh found that major fashion retailers that are closing shops and laying off workers in Europe and the U.S. are also canceling their sometimes already completed orders, as workers often go unpaid.
A… [+5600 chars]
